DOC.brief_summary: Monopolar electro surgery scissors (MES), electro thermal bipolar vessel sealer (BVS) and ultrasonically coagulating shears (UCS) are all applied in laparoscopic colorectal surgery. We aimed to compare the different devices with regard to dissection time, blood loss, technical aspects and costs. - Trial with surgical intervention
DOC.brief_title: Monopolar Scissors vs Bipolar Vessel Sealer vs Ultrasonic Shears: A Prospective Randomized Study in Laparoscopic Colorectal Surgery
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: All patients undergoing laparoscopic leftsided colorectal resection. Exclusion criteria: < 18 years no informed consent restricted communication abilities (language, mental illness)
